channel.title: Good Source
channel.description: Hello, I'm new to Servers and all, But I've been searching for HOURS! and have not found a good source i can use. Will someone give me a good one to start off with? :)

item.title: Good Source
item.dc:creator: @Dubstep Dubstep
item.description:
@Dubstep wrote:

if your starting a server of your own and actually plan on learning how to code yourself, i suggest shard revolutions. its relatively clean, you still have to code alot of it yourself, which is a good thing because then you won’ t be called a leecher. i would suggest hyperion, but you said your new to coding so thats not really an option. if you were to use this valentino base thats already edited and pretty much ready to start playing “normally”, then your probably gonna get flamed alot. heres the link for shards if your interested.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Read full topic

item.title: Good Source
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

RoidScape.Darkbb:

dude seriously…haha you also dont know anything about me…i have tried that already. my computer will do backflips for me but yet that doesnt work…idk but i have tried every tutorial on the internet. hamachi is the only way 4 me. also i really want to know how to use valentino…because even if i have to start a server from scratch this server looks amazing and id love to have it as a world 2

Please ask this in a differant topic because this topic is only about a good source for the maker of this thread.

Thanks,
Arham

Read full topic

item.title: Good Source
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

RoidScape.Darkbb:

dude…you havnt learned much about me. im from Iowa. this is my first independent server im just kinda expierementing…i was coowner to the second biggest server in 2009 but it got hacked and i just kinda quit…but anyways…no i have done nothing that you have said. all i did was compile the server and run it then run the client…idk the servers IP atm…lol i think ill just give up on that expierement

http://www.gamerzplanet.net/forums/runescape-private-server-discussion/357933-how-to-make-a-runescape-private-server-317-without-hamachi.html, you should check it out!

Read full topic

item.title: Good Source
item.dc:creator: @Junes Junes
item.description:
@Junes wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:8, topic:362444”][quote author=RoidScape.Darkbb link=topic=458731.msg3356860#msg3356860 date=1285984404]
hey dude…i am gonna use your valentino client…but idk if i can run my separate server in that client can i? and if so how?
[/quote]
seperate server?[/quote]

use a server source of his choice but use the client. lets keep it on topic.

hey i would take his advice and start small your not going to find a “good” source by your stands because i am assuming as your new you are trying to get it very similar to runescape? to get it like this you are better off starting off with the allstar source that has been suggest learn your way around the coding first. as you have to implement alot of coding into the server your self on any type of source you find that is publically posted up for download

RoidScape.Darkbb:

yeah, but now i guess i could trash that server if i wanted…id like to use a better server and the valentino looks amazing 1 problem…for 10mins ive messing with trying to even start it…it downloads the cache then says reload the client…ive tried everything idk how to reload the client…and if you open a new one it redoes the same thing

have you edited the clients ip to yours im assuming you have but you never know lol, if you have compile the client and if you have but havent compiled then guess what, compile the client haha

Read full topic

item.title: Good Source
item.dc:creator: @pimple pimple
item.description:
@pimple wrote:

RoidScape.Darkbb:

hey dude…i am gonna use your valentino client…but idk if i can run my separate server in that client can i? and if so how?

No, you may not.
Unless it is the same base, eg ; [PI], Delta.

item.title: Good Source
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

Since your new, start with moparscape client (http://rs95l35.rapidshare.com/cgi-bin/rsapi.cgi?sub=download_v1&editparentlocation=0&bin=1&fileid=28641428&filename=MoparScapeInstall.exe&dlauth=36888F4F1764064EC6C58E5EB5FEC0C603406B8A6A415509BE32B153DDDEDC8CE02ACA568D0E5401D74E4179C83C3EA6649D9B7E4A9C76AB6C7E34AE70B93837E98B5ED1C19A7A2D498D0B6BE181A7BCB8660133296F9F2971E29D4DA0653E3212F2AD362E2A1304173751ADEEACB8F9#!download|95|28641428|MoparScapeInstall.exe|1140) with allstar scape source (http://wickers.uppit.com/save/ee68d1dfbd2f3e5412fac450c7e6947e/4ca68268/0209/vpm8a5f0/AllstarScape.rar).

But as you were saying you need a good client and source so try Lost valentino Client (http://www164.megaupload.com/files/17a2b7f4494d7cb8118f889961d5a539/Lost%20Valentino%20Client%20Release.rar) and finally Lost valentino Source (http://www168.megaupload.com/files/e54bb36dbba478210d5da04eba75adc0/lost%20valentino%20v1%20source..rar)
The reason these are what you should get is cause this is hd, so your client will look awesome. Also, it has updated hp bar unlike some clients that have old or a weird looking one ;).

PICS:::

5odqg6.png765×503

13ye63b.png765×503

P.S: Be sure to give credits :).

Read full topic
